sentences.en: Caesar was a scholar, an orator and a lover of literature.
sentences.cn: 恺撒是一位学者 、 演说家和文学爱好者.

sentences.en: For a moment he had the orator's knowledge that the audience belonged to him.
sentences.cn: 在这一瞬间他就象个演说家那么知机,看出听众的心已被他抓住了.

sentences.en: He acted every part of an orator.
sentences.cn: 他表现十足了的演说家的气派.

sentences.en: He fancies himself as an orator.

sentences.cn: 他是个慷慨激昂的演说者。
他是一位了不起的演说家.

sentences.en: He is known as a gifted orator.
sentences.cn: 众所周知,他是一位天才演说家.

sentences.en: He is something like an orator.
He was a natural politician, a gifted orator who knew how to work a crowd.
sentences.cn: 他曾是位天生的政治家，是位有天赋且知道如何凝集民众的演说家。

sentences.en: He was first and foremost a fiery orator in the 19 th century mold.
sentences.cn: 他却是19世纪中期首屈一指的富于热情的雄辩家.

sentences.en: He was so eloquent that he cut down the finest orator.
sentences.cn: 他能言善辩,胜过最好的演说家.

sentences.en: The orator delivered his speech effectively.
sentences.cn: 演说家深刻有力地发表了演说.

sentences.en: The orator spoke in a bombastic manner.
sentences.cn: 这位演说家的讲话言过其实.

sentences.en: The orator talked for hours together.
sentences.cn: 那位演说者一连讲了几个小时.

sentences.en: The wrong words used by a campaign orator have lost an election.
sentences.cn: 况选演说者用词失当则会使他竞选失利.
